test_cases = int(input())
arrays = []
for test_case in range(test_cases):
    array_length = int(input())
    arrays.append([int(i) for i in input().split(' ')])
for array in arrays:
    n = array[0]
    if array.count(n) != 1:
        array_set = set(array)
        array_set.remove(n)
        n = list(array_set)[0]
    print(array.index(n) + 1)

t = int(input())
for i in range(t):
    n = int(input())
    a = list(map(int, input().split()))
    x = list(set(a))
    l = x[0]
    m = x[1]
    a1 = a.count(l)
    a2 = a.count(m)
    if a1 > a2:
        print(a.index(m) + 1)
    else:
        print(a.index(l) + 1)

n = int(input())
for i in range(n):
    p = int(input())
    a = list(map(int, input().split()))
    b = list(set(a))
    x = a.count(b[0])
    y = a.count(b[1])
    if x == 1:
        print(a.index(b[0]) + 1)
    else:
        print(a.index(b[1]) + 1)

operationNumber = int(input())
operationsDone = 0
b = []
charsSave = []

def finder(chars, charCount):
    chars = list(chars)
    chars.sort()
    if chars[0] == chars[1]:
        return chars[charCount - 1]
    else:
        return chars[0]
while operationsDone < operationNumber:
    charCount = int(input())
    chars = input().split()
    charsSave = chars
    memory = finder(chars, charCount)
    current = charsSave.index(memory) + 1
    b.append(current)
    operationsDone = operationsDone + 1
for number in b:
    print(number)

a = int(input())
for i in range(a):
    n = int(input())
    l = list(map(int, input().split()))
    d = set(l)
    d = list(d)
    x = d[0]

    if l.count(x) == 1:
        s = l.index(x)
        print(s + 1)
    if l.count(y) == 1:
        s = l.index(y)
        print(s + 1)

test_cases = int(input())
for i in range(test_cases):
    l_array = int(input())
    array = list(map(int, input().split()))
    mx = max(array)
    mn = min(array)
    cmx = array.count(mx)
    cmn = array.count(mn)
    if cmx == 1:
        print(array.index(mx) + 1)
    else:
        print(array.index(mn) + 1)

t = int(input())
l = []
for i in range(t):
    n = int(input())
    x = list(map(int, input().split()))
    y = x.copy()
    x.sort()
    if x[0] == x[1]:
        q = y.index(x[n - 1])
    else:
        q = y.index(x[0])
    l.append(q)
for i in l:
    print(i + 1)

m = int(input())
c = 0
b = 0
for j in range(m):
    n = int(input())
    l = [int(i) for i in input().split()]
    for i in range(n):
        c = l.count(l[i])
        if c == 1:
            b = l.index(l[i])
            print(b + 1)

t = int(input())
for i in range(t):
    n = int(input())
    a = list(map(int, input().split()))
    b = a.copy()
    b.sort()
    p = len(b)
    c = b.count(b[0])
    d = b.count(b[p - 1])
    if c == 1:
        x = a.index(b[0])
        print(x + 1)
    elif d == 1:
        y = a.index(b[p - 1])
        print(y + 1)
